metadata.title: CVE-2012-3790 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in AdisconLogAnalyzer before 3.4.4 and 3.5.x before 3.5.5 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the highlight parameter in a Searchaction.

criterions.comment: loganalyzer package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
